item.description: Come join us at the Johnathan Edwards Winery for a fun day from noon to 6 pm. Weâ€™ll try all of their latest vintages, wander the grounds, enjoy grape stomping contests, hayrides, fantastic music, raw bar, and antipasto station. Cost $25 at door or $20 pre-purchase by calling 860-535-0202. Rain or shine. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 74 Chester Main Rd.: Rt. 9S to end, left onto I-95N, take exit 92 to Rt. 2W, at light on Main Street (across from Mobil station) turn right into North Stonington, slight jog left onto Wyassup Road in Village Center, take 3rd right onto Chester Main Rd., winery on right at top of hill.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our Social Connections sign.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections
